name: Yoshida Halo Merge App
description:
The Hands-on Portal Digital Dashboard Yoshida Halo Merge Application Webble

Old Hands-on Portal application using the old version of the DigitalDashboard.

This Webble app loads a few DigitalDashboard components, connects them, and loads some data. Sets up a visualization environment that allows interaction with halos in space moving over time and merging into larger halos.
author: legacyDigitalDashboard
